org.fcrepo.syndication

Class RSSPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.syndication.RSSPublisher

  • @Component
public class RSSPublisher
extends AbstractResource
    Listen to the event bus and record the most recent 10 events, and provide them as an RSS feed.
